snippet: Shakira’s self-titled new album reached No. 2 with 84,000 copies sold, about half the sales of the soundtrack to Disney’s film “Frozen,” in its eighth week at No. 1.
abstract: Shakira’s self-titled new album reached No. 2 with 84,000 copies sold, about half the sales of the soundtrack to Disney’s film “Frozen,” in its eighth week at No. 1.

headline.print_headline: Billboard Album Chart Seems ‘Frozen’ in Time
